postBootScript:
#!/bin/bash
pip install python-daemon==2.1.2
yum install -y python-devel gcc
pip install psutil
pip install Kafka-python
git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/host-key-tools.git /root/host-key-tools
cd /root/host-key-tools/hostkey-py/
python setup.py install
cp /root/host-key-tools/ch-host-key-tools.service /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service
sed -i 's/ExecStart=.*/ExecStart=\/usr\/bin\/hostkeyd start -c https:\/\/comet-hn1.exogeni.net:8111\/ -s WORKFLOW -r WORKFLOWread -w WORKFLOWwrite -k 18.223.195.153:9092/g' /usr/lib/systemd/system/host-key-tools.service
systemctl enable host-key-tools.service
 service host-key-tools.service start
git clone https://github.com/RENCI-NRIG/Mobius-scripts.git /root/Mobius-scripts
cp /root/Mobius-scripts/scripts/merit/worker.sh /root/worker.sh
sh /root/worker.sh
